9679.T.summary: HORAI Co., Ltd. engages in the insurance, real estate, dairy, restaurants and sightseeing facilities, and golf businesses in Japan. It is involved in the non-life insurance agency and life insurance offering businesses; leasing and managing buildings and real estate properties; manufacturing and selling milk and dairy products; breeding, milking, and feed production of dairy cattle; managing restaurants and sightseeing facilities; and operating Horai Country Club and Nishinasuno Country Club. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

EEW.F.summary: SBI Insurance Group Co., Ltd. provides various insurance products in Japan. It offers property/casualty, life, and small short term insurance products. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan. SBI Insurance Group Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of SBI Holdings, Inc.
